TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: I thought that the size of this planet deserved a monument of fitting stature, so I constructed this tower here!
BETULA: This is lovely Alnus! I look forward to seeing the top chamber of the tower once you put in a tractor beam to get up there!
ALNUS: Tractor beam? We don't have any means by which to make a tractor beam, we weren't given the right materials.
BETULA: Oh? Then what means do you intend us to use to get up there? The gravity of this planet is far too high for a thrustpack to give the necessary height.
ALNUS: ...I left my lunch up thereâ€¦
DAUCUS: There's probably some easy way to get up there. If gravity is the issue, maybe we can find a way to weaken it.
DAUCUS: I'll admit that this is pretty impressive, especially considering how strong the gravity of this planet is.
ADONSONIA: Ha! Intentional or not, that's a good prank. I don't know if I could have done better myself!
